Digital Brain Switch (DBS) is a project funded by the Engineering and Physical Sciences Research Council (EPSRC), which brings together computer science and social science. It is a collaboration between Lancaster University; The Open University; Royal Holloway, University of London; and University of Kent. The project is led by Prof. Jon Whittle from the School of Computing & Communications at Lancaster University. \n\nEmail: DBS-Project@open.ac.uk 0.1 Settings
